property.name: code_preference
property.help: Specify the code you prefer to generate. This can affect default settings for variable names, various initial UI states, and the UI display in the Mockup panel.

property.name: art_directory
property.help: The directory containing your images (png, ico, xpm, etc.).

property.name: dialog_units
property.help: When checked, dimensions will default to using dialog units. You can turn on or off dialog units for each individual dimension -- this just sets the default for new dimensions.

property.name: internationalize
property.help: Wrap strings in a _() macro.

property.name: help_provider
property.help: The class of help provider to use for context-sensitive help.

property.name: id_prefixes
property.help: Optional prefixes to apply before a custom id. These can be added in the ID Editor dialog.

property.name: id_suffixes
property.help: Optional suffixes to apply after a custom id. These can be added in the ID Editor dialog.

property.name: label
property.help: The name of the folder.

property.name: code_preference
property.help: Specify the code you prefer to generate. This can affect default settings for variable names, various initial UI states, and the UI display in the Mockup panel.

property.name: label
property.help: The name of the folder.

property.name: base_file
property.help: The C++ filename to store all the embedded images in.

property.name: python_file
property.help: The Python filename to store all the embedded images in.

property.name: ruby_file
property.help: The Ruby filename to store all the embedded images in.

property.name: add_externs
property.help: If checked, each image data array will be added to the header file as an extern.

property.name: auto_add
property.help: If checked, then whenver you add an image file to a control, it will automatically be added to the Images List.

property.name: interval
property.help: Specifies the number of milliseconds between timer events.

property.name: auto_start
property.help: If checked, this will start start the timer in the parent class Create function.

property.name: one_shot
property.help: If checked, this will start a one shot timer (ignored if auto_start isn't checked).

property.name: id
property.help: Specifies the timer's identifier.

event.name: wxEVT_TIMER
event.help: Timer event that will be sent to the parent form's class.

property.name: output_file
property.help: The C++ filename to store all the data strings in.

property.name: label
property.help: The name of the folder.

property.name: no_compression
property.help: If checked, the file will not be compressed. Check this when adding a binary file that has already been compressed. If unchecked, the file will be compressed using zlib.

property.name: xml_condensed_format
property.help: If checked, the file is parsed and rewritten, removing all line breaks, indetation and comments. This will speed up parsing if the string is passed to an XML parser.
